DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical angiographic outcome implantation stent elute elute Sirolimus patient complex coronary artery lesion suitable percutaneous coronary intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Stenting With Without Coating Compared With Angioplasty Non-benestent Disease
DOC.criteria: Stable , unstable angina and/or objective sign myocardial ischaemia Informed consent Optimal result ( < 35 % residual stenosis < type C dissection ) balloon angioplasty Lesions de novo locate native vessel diameter > 2.25 mm . Complex lesion include least one follow characteristic : ostial location ( < 5 mm ostium ) total occlusion length ≥ 15 mm bifurcational ( side branch > 1.75 mm diameter ) angulate ( > 45° within lesion ) Exclusion criterion : Patients : Other severe disease expect survival < 1 year Other significant cardiac disease Known allergy paclitaxel , clopidogrel ( ticlopidine ) , Myocardial infarction within 3 day index procedure Linguistic difficulty need interpreter Renal insufficiency ( pcreatinine > 200 micromol/l ) Gastrointestinal bleeding within 1 month Childbearing potential pregnancy Participation another study Lesions : Unprotected leave main disease Restenosis Lesions contain visible thrombus Treatment modality balloon stent ( ablation , brachytherapy , ultrasound ) connection index procedure Diffuse coronary disease distal treat lesion Heavily calcification Lesion locate saphenous vein graft
